description: A high-growth portfolio focused on long-term wealth creation with high equity allocation. Suited for young or high-risk investors.
suitable_for: Young investors in their 20s or early 30s
Individuals with no immediate liquidity needs
recommended_lumpsum_use: Deploy via 6–12 month STP to avoid timing risks.
historical_behaviour: Strong long-term compounding when held for 7–10+ years.
Small and mid caps contribute disproportionately to returns.
Gold allocation provides crash protection during major sell-offs.
rebalancing_strategy: Rebalance every 9–12 months to prevent equity rising above 80–85% in bull markets.
rationale: Dominant equity exposure maximizes long-term compounding.
Mid and small caps deliver strong growth over long horizons.
Gold and minimal debt help cushion severe downturns.
Ideal for investors with high risk tolerance and long investment horizons.
